original_text: You shall not fall in with the many to do evil, nor shall you bear witness in a lawsuit, siding with the many, so as to pervert justice,
korean_text: 다수를 따라 악을 행하지 말며 송사에 다수를 따라 부당한 증언을 하지 말며

sentences.original_text: You shall not fall in with the many to do evil
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다수를 따라 악을 행해서는 안 된다.

sentences.original_text: nor shall you bear witness in a lawsuit
